title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and managing quantized LLMs locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: First-party JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama REST API—works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK exposing sync & async clients for chatting, embedding, and model ops.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard (SvelteKit) for chatting, model management, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library exposing typed APIs, streaming, and utility helpers for Android/JVM.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI for interactive chats, model search, and log management over Ollama REST.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning local Ollama models into inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC templates.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API for Rails scripting and chatbots.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Minimal Alpine-based multi-arch image (CPU & CUDA) with automatic model caching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset enabling Ollama models in semantic search & generative pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK supporting .NET 6+, Blazor, and MAUI desktop apps.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that exposes slash commands to chat with any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for model browsing, one-click start/stop, and chat windows.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver plugin that adds SQL query generation and explanation using Ollama LLMs.
